StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Differential Response to Hydroxyurea and Incidence of Stroke in Sickle Cell Disease

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This work was done in the Human Genome Sequencing Center at Baylor College of Medicine in collaboration with Drs. Jonathan Flanagan, Vivien Sheehan and Russell Ware. The work was supported by a grant from NHGRI # U54 HG003273. Publications resulting from these data must acknowledge all collaborators as well as sample sources: St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital clinical staff for providing hydroxyurea management and co-ordinating the HUSTLE study, in particular Shirley Steward, Thad A. Howard, Nicole A. Mortier, Amy C. Kimble, William H. Schultz, Banu Aygun, Jane S. Hankins, and Russell E. Ware for patient recruitment and sample processing. SWiTCH clinical investigators and study coordinators for their efforts in recruiting subjects at all patient recruitment sites: Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, TX (Brigitta U. Mueller, MD); Boston Children’s Hospital, Boston, MA (Matthew Heeney, MD); Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, PA (Janet L. Kwiatkowski, MD, MSCE); Children’s Hospital of Pittsburgh at UPMC, Pittsburgh, PA (Lakshmanan Krishnamurti, MD); Children’s Memorial Hospital, Chicago, IL (Alexis Thompson, MD, MPH); Children’s Mercy Hospital, Kansas, MO (Gerald Woods, MD); Children’s National Medical Center, Washington, DC (Caterina Minniti, MD); Children’s Hospital Medical Center, Cincinnati, OH (Karen Kalinyak, MD); Cohen Children’s Medical Center of NY, New Hyde Park, NY (Sharon Singh, MD); Columbia University, New York, NY (Margaret T. Lee, MD); East Carolina University, Greenville, NC (Charles Daeschner, MD); Eastern Virginia Medical School, Norfolk, VA (William Owen, MD); Emory University/Children’s Healthcare of Atlanta, Atlanta, GA (Ifeyinwa Osunkwo, MD, Peter Lane, MD); Cincinnati Medical College of Wisconsin, Milwaukee, WI (J. Paul Scott, MD); Medical University of South Carolina, Charleston, SC (Sherron M. Jackson, MD); Nemours Children’s Clinic, Jacksonville, FL (Cynthia Gauger, MD), Nemours Children’s Clinic, Orlando, FL (Ramamoorthy Nagasubramanian, MD); St. Joseph’s Children’s Hospital, Paterson, NJ (Rafael Barilari, MD); St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, Memphis, TN (Banu Aygun, MD, Winfred C. Wang, MD); SUNY-Downstate Medical Center, Brooklyn, NY (Scott Miller, MD); The Children’s Hospital at Montefiore, Bronx, NY (Catherine Driscoll, MD); The University of Texas Southwestern, Dallas, TX (Zora R. Rogers, M.D.); University of Alabama, Birmingham, AL (Lee Hilliard, MD); University of Miami, Miami, FL (Ofelia Alvarez, MD); University of Mississippi Medical Center, Jackson, MS (Rathi Iyer, MD, Mary Gail Smith, MD); Vanderbilt University, Nashville, TN (Elizabeth Yang, MD, PhD); Wayne State University, Detroit, MI (Sharada Sarnaik, MD)

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

StudyTo.name: dbGaP Collection: Compilation of Individual-Level Genomic Data for General Research Use
